Class TeleportData

  • java.lang.Object
    • soccer.common.TeleportData
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Data

    public class TeleportData
extends java.lang.Object
implements Data
    Provides teleportation data for the object controlled by the user

        public TeleportData(char objType,
            int playerID,
            double newX,
            double newY)
        Constructs a TeleportData for writing to an UDP packet. for teleportiing objects grabbed by the mouse
        Parameters:
        objType - object type (ball or left/right player).
        force - playerID player id.
        newX, - newY new coordinates of the object
